descr_WRONGUSERPASS.en: Either no user with the given username could be found, or the password you gave was wrong. Please check the username and try again.

descr_LDAP_ACCDISABLED.en: The LDAP account is disabled, login is denied

descr_LDAP_ACCEXPIRED.en: The LDAP account is expired, login is denied

descr_KRB_ACCEXPIRED.en: The Kerberos account is expired, login is denied

descr_SAMBA_ACCEXPIRED.en: The Samba account is expired, login is denied

title_LDAP_PWCHANGE.en: The password has expired and must be renewed

title_KRB_PWCHANGE.en: The password has expired and must be renewed

title_SAMBA_PWCHANGE.en: The password has expired and must be renewed

descr_SAMBA_ACCLOCKED.en: The Samba account is locked, login is denied

descr_KRB_ACCLOCKED.en: The Kerberos account is locked, login is denied

descr_univention:RETYPE_MISMATCH.en: The passwords do not match, please retype again.

title_univention:PASSWORD_CHANGE_SUCCESS.en: The password has been changed successfully
